content.pl: Generalnie Mo偶e by ale spodziewaem si czego lepszego, syrena nie jest za mocna, obraz Mo偶e by i tylko mo偶e by ale jestem rozczarowany bo podobno 4mpix, miaem jakie pogosy przy w goniku, szau nie ma og贸lnie gdyby nie wyjazd to raczej bym odda i doo偶y do czego lepszego a po opisie wydawaa si dobra
content.en: Generally It may be, but I expected something better, the siren is not too strong, the image It may be and only it may be, but I am disappointed because it is supposedly 4 megapixels, I had some reverberations when the speaker was turned on, overall it's not crazy, if it weren't for the trip, I would rather give it back and add to it something better and from the description it seemed good

content.pl: Praktyczna w obserwacji terenu wok贸 posesji.prosta wkonfiguracji z internetem du偶o funkcji w ustawieniach .Og贸lnie dobry sprzt w stosunku do cen na rynku o tej samej klasie
content.en: Practical in observing the area around the property. Easy to configure with the Internet, many functions in the settings. Overall, good equipment in relation to the prices on the market of the same class :)

content.pl: Kamera w porzdku ale jako obrazu to dramat. 2K HD? Nope. Filmy mo偶na por贸wna do 480p i to bdzie max. 720p w kamerze wyglda jak 144p. Lipa. Na ogromny plus to aplikacja, kt贸ra ma naprawd fajne funkcje i mnogo konfiguracji. Minusem aplikacji jest to 偶e nie da si ustawi drugiego administratora i tylko jedna osoba mo偶e zarzdza funkcjami kamer. Cena jest jest na plus ale podciga to aplikacja. Gdyby nie apka, cena samej kamery powinna by 100zl max.
content.en: The camera is fine, but the image quality is terrible. 2K HD? Nope. Videos can be compared to 480p and that will be the max. 720p looks like 144p on the camera. Lime tree. A huge plus is an application that has really cool functions and a multitude of configurations. The disadvantage of the application is that you cannot set a second administrator and only one person can manage camera functions. The price is a plus, but the application makes it worse. If it weren't for the app, the price of the camera itself should be PLN 100 max.
